name: The Sandwich of Death (D&D 5e One-Shot)
description:
Most of the party stumbles upon an advert for a sandwich you must eat properly or face the risk of death. However, one comes home to the leftovers and, unaware of the sandwich's conditions, eats it wrong. The journey for the cure ensues, featuring puzzles, physical feats, and fights!

This game is based on an episode of The Regular Show, and is a cheesy, shitty one-shot for a night in with good friends (and possibly many drinks).
